div.div:
â€¢ Use consistent trace_id and span_id across all signals
â€¢ Link logs to traces: Include trace context in every log entry
â€¢ Link traces to metrics: Use exemplars to connect metrics to specific traces
â€¢ Unified visualization: Use tools that correlate all three pillars (Grafana, Datadog, etc.)

switch.text: â€¢ Use consistent trace_id and span_id across all signals...
